subject: [Wordfence Alert] Problems found on mets.edu.au/stage1
preview: This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin. Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (11 existing issues were also found again).

full_threads.body:
This email was sent from your website "METS Training Services" by the Wordfence plugin.

Wordfence found the following new issues on "METS Training Services" (11 existing issues were also found again).

Alert generated at Monday 22nd of December 2025 at 03:27:13 AM


See the details of these scan results on your site at: https://mets.edu.au/stage1/wp-admin/admin.php?page=WordfenceScan

Critical Problems:

* The Plugin "JetElements For Elementor" needs an upgrade (2.7.9.1 -> 2.7.12.2).

Update includes security-related fixes.
Vulnerability Severity: 6.4/10.0 (Medium) Vulnerability Information
/#developers

* The Plugin "JetEngine" needs an upgrade (3.7.3 -> 3.8.1.1).

Update includes security-related fixes.
Vulnerability Severity: 6.4/10.0 (Medium) Vulnerability Information
/#developers

Medium Severity Problems:

* The Plugin "Wordfence Security" needs an upgrade (8.1.3 -> 8.1.4).

https://wordpress.org/plugins/wordfence/#developers

* The Plugin "JetSearch" needs an upgrade (3.5.12 -> 3.5.16.1).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetSmartFilters" needs an upgrade (3.6.9 -> 3.7.2).

/#developers

* The Plugin "JetTabs For Elementor" needs an upgrade (2.2.10 -> 2.2.12.1).

/#developers

11 existing issues were found again and are not shown.
